College_Summary:
IIT Guwahati is India’s one of the leading public technical Universities. Established in 1994, IIT Guwahati is located on the serene northern banks of Brahmaputra. The campus of the university is located on a sprawling 700-acre area on the banks of river Brahmaputra. As per NIRF 2023 rankings, IIT Guwahati is ranked on 7th in the Engineering category. The college offers more than 160 courses at the UG, PG and doctoral levels. The most popular course offered at IIT Guwahati is BTech where admission is granted as per JEE Advanced Score + JoSAA counseling. IIT Guwahati BTech CSE Cutoff 2023 is 398-654. IIT Guwahati B.Tech fees for the first year are approximately INR 2.19 Lakhs. Check: IIT Guwahati Admission

IIT Guwahati has concluded the placements for the year 2023. During these placements,1112 offers were made to IIT Guwahati students. The offered pay package at IIT Guwahati BTech CSE placements in 2023 was INR 42.10 LPA. The highest domestic package offered at IIT Guwahati was INR 1.1 crore per year, whereas the highest international package was INR 2.4 crore per year. For the MTech & MDes program, the highest CTC remained INR 57.07 LPA and 51.32 LPA respectively.

College_Name: Department of Business Administration, Tezpur University, Tezpur
College_Summary: Department of Business Administration Tezpur University was founded in the year 1995. It works with a vision “to be a coveted knowledge hub of management education for creating socially responsible global citizens”. The institute is affiliated with Tezpur University and approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE). It has been ranked 98th by Business Today (BT) 2023 under Top B-Schools category. It offers MBA, Diploma and Ph.D. programs for its students. Admission to the MBA program is based on national level entrance exams such as CAT, MAT. While for Ph.D., Tezpur University conducts its own exam.

College_Summary: Assam University is a government university set up by the central government in the year 1994. The main campus of the university is situated in Dargakona which is 20 kms away from Silchar city. Assam University is recognised by the UGC, AICTE and AIU. It has 16 schools comprising more than 40 departments .

College_Summary: The National Institute of Technology, Silchar was founded in 1967 as a Regional Engineering College in Assam and is one of India's 31 National Institutes of Technology. NIT Silchar is an autonomous institute under the Indian government. The National Institutes of Technology Act of 2007 declared it as an Institute of National Importance after it was upgraded to the rank of National Institute of Technology in 2002. It is located 12 kilometers from Silchar, Assam. In the NIRF Ranking 2023, NIT Silchar ranked 83rd overall and 40th in the engineering category. NIT Silchar provides 37 courses in 13 departments in science, engineering, architecture, and management. Check NIT Silchar Courses

College_Summary: Royal Global University (RGU) is the fifth private university of Assam, established in 2017 by The Assam Royal Global University Bill, passed by the Assam Legislative Assembly. The campus of RGU is spread on an area of 27 acres and about 12 lakh square feet built up in a centrally air-conditioned area. RGU offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in various disciplines under different schools of RGU.

Dibrugarh University is a well-known co-educational institute of tertiary level education in the state of Assam, India. It was established in 1965 by the Assam Legislative Assembly to promote innovation and entrepreneurship among the students.

College_Name: Guwahati College of Architecture and Planning, Guwahati
College_Summary: Guwahati College of Architecture and Planning, or GCAP, was founded in 2006 by Dona Foundation. The college offers three courses in architecture and interior designing namely, Bachelor of Architecture, Master of Planning (Urban and regional planning), and Bachelor in Interior Designing. The college has been ranked 2nd in the eastern region with an All India Rank of 21. GCAP ranked 22nd in Top Architecture Colleges in India by Times of India, 2020.

Located in Guwahati, Assam, NEF Law College is considered as one of the finest platforms of Law Education in the Eastern part of the country. The institution is affiliated to Guwahati University and is duly approved by the BCI and UGC.

This was possible because they have been able to elevate the output standard of passing out students at higher stratum than their level output.

College_Summary: Dispur College was established 1978 and is recognized by UGC. This college provides graduation degree in different departments i.e. Arts, Commerce and Management. The college also offers diploma in open and distance education for 5 different courses that are BA, BCom, BBA, BCA, BJMC, MA, MSW which comes under KKHSOU. Moreover, the college provides short term certificate computer course in the field of computer software from 2003 to 2004 through Dispur college computer society.

College_Summary: Guwahati College is one of the premier colleges of higher education established in 1964. It is affiliated to Gauhati University & is approved by UGC. The college has been awarded a B grade by NAAC. Presently, the college is running higher secondary and degree courses in the field of arts, science, and commerce. The college has highly-qualified teaching staff & also has an impressive infrastructure.

Established in 1943, B. Borooah College is one of the earliest and prestigious co-educational colleges situated in Guwahati in the state of Assam, which was named after the most respected and prominent person of Assamese business Bholanath Borooah. This college grew under the circumstances of World War II. With the support of B. Borooah College Teacher’s Unit (BBCTU) which is a constituent unit of Assam College Teachers Unit (ACTU) the college has been carrying out various plans and programmes for the welfare and overall progress and development of the college and students as well. The college offers various courses from Arts and Science stream to the students. B. Borooah College is accredited with Grade ‘A’ by NAAC, funded by University Grants Commission (UGC) and is affiliated with Guwahati University. It offers undergraduate courses such as B.A., B.Sc., B.B.A. and postgraduate courses such as M.Sc.

Handique Girls College was established in 1939 for women’s’ education in Assam. The college offers graduation and post-graduation courses to the students in the Science and Arts stream. It also offers a PGDCA program for students having an interest in Computer Applications. Handique Girls College is approved by AICTE and is affiliated to Guwahati University.

Gauhati University or also known as GU is the oldest university in North-East India located in Jalukbari, Gauhati, The University is accredited grade ‘A’ by National Assessment and Accreditation Council. Gauhati University has 42 post-graduate departments and a constituent college for Engineering and law. More than 350 colleges are affiliated with GU. The National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF) ranked Gauhati University 88th in the University Category in 2023. GU also provides distance/ Online Education through IDOL (Institute of Distance and Open Learning) Check Gauhati University Distance Education

IIIT Guwahati provides B.Tech, M.Tech, and Ph.D. programs. There are 290 seats available for B.Tech and M.Tech students.

College_Summary: The Assam Engineering College, Guwahati is one of the premier institutes in the northeast founded in the year 1955. The institute provides a bachelor in a total of 8 fields of engineering. The branches include a computer, electrical, chemical, instrumentation, mechanical, civil, electronics and telecommunications, and industrial and productions. The post-graduation is offered in mechanical, civil, and electrical engineering and master of computer applications. Other than engineering, the institute conducts courses like science, humanities, and computer application.

Assam Don Bosco University (ADBU), a State Private University, is located in Guwahati, Assam. The University was founded on March 29, 2008, by the Salesians of Don Bosco and holds the 2(f) and 12(B) Status approvals from the University Grants Commission (UGC), Government of India. It is approved by AICTE and also accredited by NAAC with an A grade.

College_Name: NERIM Group of Institutions (NERIM Guwahati)- Courses | Placements | Admissions | Faculty | Rankings |
College_Summary: NERIM Group of Institutions (NERIM), Guwahati is a part of selected educational groups offering programs in the genre - Business Administration (MBA & BBA), Computer Science and IT (MCA, MSc.CS, & BCA), Commerce (M.Com & B.Com), Applied Psychology (MA Applied Psychology), Social Work (MSW & BSW), Teacher Training (B.Ed.) and Legal Learning (LLM, LLB & BA.LLB), in accordance with the respective affiliating Universities. Among all, the popular course of the institute is the MBA program offered in full-time as well as part-time.

The college, affiliated with Assam Science and Technology University, is accredited by the All India Council for Technical Education. It was ranked under top 100 Engineering colleges of India by Dalal Street Investment Journal in 2010 on the day of its Golden Jubilee.

College_Summary: Assam Agricultural University was set up in the year 1969, in Jorhat, Assam. It is a UGC approved university which offers undergraduates and postgraduate courses in streams like Agriculture, Veterinary Science, Community science and Fisheries science, Horticulture and Sericulture. AAU also offers research level courses. Admissions to all courses are merit-based except B.Sc Veterinary Science for which admissions are based on entrance exam known as AAU VET, conducted by the university itself.

College_Summary: Assam Science and Technology University was established in 2010 in Guwahati. The university offers various courses in the field of Science and Technology. ASTU Assam has schools in fields of Engineering, Science, Pharmaceutical Science, Management and Architecture, Planning & Design and offers various undergraduate, postgraduate and doctoral courses. Eligibility for UG courses is 10 + 2 passed and the same for PG courses is a bachelor’s degree in a relevant field. Selection for B.Tech and M.Tech is done on the basis of the entrance exam (Assam CEE and GATE respectively) whereas, for all other courses, admission is done on the basis of merit in the previous qualifying examination.

College_Name: Asian Institute of Management and Technology
College_Summary: Asian Institute of Management and Technology was established in 2008. The institute offers 6 UG and PG courses in the discipline of Management, Commerce and Banking, IT, Science, Media, and Mass Communication. Admission to all the courses is done strictly on the basis of the merit of the qualifying examinations. Candidates have to fill an online form which is available on the college website.

College_Summary: Assam Down Town University (ADTU) was set up in the year 2010 with the aim of providing quality education to North East students at an affordable price. The university is recognized by All India Council for Technical Education, University Grants Commission, Pharmacy Council of India, Indian Association of Physiotherapy, and Indian Nursing Council. The university has more than 8000+ students and 250+ faculty members

College_Summary: Assam Women's University (AWU), established in 2013, is a public women's university that provides courses at the UG, PG, and Diploma level to eligible candidates. Created by the Assam Women's University Act, 2013, the institute was the first-ever women's college to be set up in Assam and has also been recognized by the UGC. The various courses offered at the UG level include BA and BPT, with a duration of three years. For PG programs, the college offers an MA with eight specializations, M.Sc. in Fashion Design and Technology, MCA, MBA, MTTM as well as an MLIS course.

College_Summary: Barak Valley Engineering College (BVEC), Karimganj established in the year 2017 is the first state government engineering college in the Barak Valley and the fifth state engineering college. The Government of Assam took the initiative to set up this engineering college in 2009 and started its full operation in 2017 under the Department of Technical Education (DTE) of Assam. It is affiliated to Gauhati University and approved by AICTE. The college currently offers Bachelor of Engineering courses in 2 disciplines viz. Computer Science & Engineering and Electronics & Telecommunication Engineering. Admissions are done through Assam CEE.

College_Name: Royal School of Engineering and Technology - [RSET], Guwahati
College_Summary:
Royal School of Engineering and Technology (RSET), Guwahati was established in the year 2009. The institute is managed by Royal Group of Institutions (RGI). Royal Group of Institutions (RGI) stands high with its virtues of excellence and a humble contribution to the society at large. RSET is imparting eight courses approved by AICTE. The main objective of Royal School of Engineering and Technology is to develop managerial and technical talent by offering a wide range of under -graduate and post-graduate program in management and technical education to meet evolving industry needs.Â 
The college is devoted to attain high standards & excellence in specialized professional with the primary objective of imparting under-graduate and post-graduate education, To dedicate a service to the community through a combination of commitment and state-of-the-art technology instruction & training in various branches of learning, research for the advancement of knowledge, to build-up sound character as well as to be ultimately recognized as a centre for excellence in management and technical education, quality research and for its strong industry interface and to help maintain ecological balance and take up related program.

Cachar College is a reputed institute of higher learning situated in Silchar in south Assam, and established in 1960.  It is accredited by UGC and is affiliated with Assam University and the Assam Higher Secondary Education Council and also supported by the Government of Assam.

Chaiduar College, Sonitpur was established in 1967, by a few humble citizens of this region with active financial and moral support from the neighbouring populace. It is affiliated to Gauhati University and accredited with ‘B’ Grade by NAAC. It strives to act as an institution for quality in higher education and become an instrument for development of the society by providing necessary inputs to deepen the knowledge of various disciplines under its fold. The motto of the college is to prepare the youth to remain resolutely fixed to their goal and the over changing values and perspectives of life so as to enable them to identify themselves as conscious, integrated and wholesome human beings capable of meeting the challenge and opportunity of life in the noblest and most disciplined way.

College_Summary: Dibru College, established in 1963, has been accredited by NAAC with 'A' grade. It offers UG courses in all three streams- Arts, Science and Commerce in two shifts  Morning and Day. Additionally, the college offers some vocational and development courses. Admission to all the courses is merit-based and students seeking admission need to apply online through the official website. The student composition of this college is such that 80% of its enrolled students belong to  SC/ST or OBC/ or either MOBC communities. The college is well equipped with all the required facilities to provide the premier learning to the students such as labs, library, computer facilities, canteen and many more.

Digboi College, Dibrugarh, Assam is a premier institute established in 1965. The institute offers both full time and distance education programs. The fulltime courses include B.A Hons, B.Sc Hons, B.Com Hons, M.Sc, PG Diploma, Diploma, and certification courses. The distance education courses include B.A General, B.Com General, M.A, and PG Diploma. Admissions to all courses are solely based on merit in the qualifying examination.

College_Summary: Established in 1955, Goalpara College is affiliated to Gauhati University, Guwahati. The college offers different Undergraduate programs under science, arts and commerce fields, such as B.com, B.Sc, and BA. The selection criteria for students who are interested are based on the merit list and pass in Assam Higher Secondary Final Examination (10+2) or its equivalent from the All India Boards/ Councils (i.e. CBSE, ISC, and National Institute of Open Schooling). Applicants may apply both online and offline for the admission process.

Gogamukh college is a well-known institute in Dhemaji District. The college was established in the year 1981. The institute is affiliated with Dibrugarh University, Dibrugarh. The college offers UG and diploma courses. Admission to Gogamukh college is purely based on merit. The application mode is online.

The institution offers undergraduate courses in Science, Arts and Commerce streams, along with vocational courses, business administration, and computer application. In addition, it also offers postgraduate courses in Commerce and Arts. The entire admission procedure is conducted online, with the student physically stepping in only at the time of counseling. The selection procedure is based on merit in the previous qualifying examination.

Lanka Mahavidyalayaa is a general degree college in Nagaon district in the state of Assam, founded in the year of 1979. College_Summary: Sonapur College situated in the Kamrup (Metro) District of Assam was established in the year 1991. The college is known for providing unique and skilled based courses to the students. Some of the unique courses include Bachelor’s in Theatre & Stagecraft, Bachelor’s in Automotive Operations, Bachelors in Retail Management, etc. Being one of the premier institutions of the district, the college is being ranked at 109 positions by India Today. The college offers a variety of UG and PG courses, the admission to which is completely based on merit. The college follows a Choice Based Credit System Approach where a student can opt for certain subjects according to his/her interests from a bunch of available subjects as a part of the syllabus.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Management [PGDM] (Retail Management)
Post Graduate Diploma in Computer Applications [PGDCA]

College_Summary: Tezpur College, Tezpur, Assam is one of the oldest educational institutes in Assam that has come forward with the initiative to expand their horizons and provide for educational curriculum beyond the traditional set-up. The College initially faced infrastructure difficulties but with over a span of 50 years the college has developed with leaps and bounds and is now spread across acres of land. The College provides for bachelors, master, philosophy and doctoral programs in arts, commerce, Assamese, Bengali, Hindi, Bodo, Geography, travel and tourism, economics, music, computer applications and political science.

Tinsukia College, established in 1956 is affiliated to Dibrugarh University and has been accredited by NAAC with a 'B+' grade. The college offers admission to various UG courses. Initially, the college offered courses only related to Arts stream but later commerce stream was also introduced. The mode of admission is online and selection is completely merit based, as per the guidelines of Assam Higher Secondary Education Council and the Dibrugarh University.

It is popularly known as J.B. Law College (JBLC). Established in 1969 in Guwahati, Assam, JB Law College has been imparting legal education. It currently offers LLB, LLB Hons., BA LLB Hons., and LL.M.

College_Summary: Gauhati Medical College and Hospital is a government college situated in Assam inaugurated on September 20, 1960. The college is affiliated with Srimanta Sankaradeva University of Health Sciences (SSUHS). It is approved by the Medical Council of India (MCI). The undergraduate courses of Gauhati Medical College are also recognized by the General Medical Council of UK enabling students to continue their education in foreign countries. The college offers undergraduate, postgraduate, diploma and doctoral courses. Gauhati Medical College has been ranked in the 48th position out of 100 by IIRF in the year 2023.

It is affiliated to Gauhati University, Guwahati, and is approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE).

College_Summary: Assam Medical College, Dibrugarh is one of the well known medical institutes of the North East Region of India. Established as Berry White Medical School in 1900 by British Philanthropist Sir John Berry White, the institute became a full-fledged government-approved Assam Medical College in 1947. The college is affiliated to Srimanta Sankaradeva University of Health Sciences (SSUHS) Dibrugarh University. The institute has been ranked 62 in the list of government institutes.it has been rated AAA+ by the Medical Council of India with a score of 273.5.

Jorhat Medical College (JMC Jorhat) was founded in 2009. The college offers MBBS and PG courses in 8 specializations. For UG and PG courses admission are through their NEET UG & NEET PG scores and counselling of NEET Assam state. The minimum qualifications for MBBS 10 + 2 is at least 50% marks in PCB / Biotech combination. Minimum authorization for PG admission must be an MBBS graduate. The application process for admission is online.

Silchar Medical College was established in 1968. The college offers MBBS courses in the UG category. Eligibility for this program is 10 + 2 passed and selection is done on the basis of the NEET UG entrance examination. Under the PG and Diploma category, it offers MD and MS courses. Admission to these courses is done on the basis of NEET PG score and to be eligible for these, the candidate must have completed the MBBS course.
Some of the important highlights about AIN Guwahati are mentioned below:

DHSK Commerce College (Dibrugarh Hanumanbux Surajmal Kanoi Commerce College) was established in 1960 and located in Dibrugarh, Assam. DHSK college is affiliated to Dibrugarh University. The College is recognised by UGC and has been accredited by NAAC (Grade B) in 2004.

College_Summary: Assam Institute of Management, shortly referred to as AIM, was established in 1988 as a public institute in Guwahati. It offers 4 specializations of MBA, recently converted from the PGDM courses. Admissions to the courses are on the basis of entrance examinations, followed by Personal Interviews and Group Discussions. The admission process is both online and offline.

College_Name: Ataur Rahman College of Education - [ARCE], Barpeta

College_Summary: Kaliabor College of Education (KCE) is situated in the Nagaon region of Assam. Established in the year 1992, by the Government of Assam, with the sole purpose to promote Teacher education in the state of Assam. The college provides a B.Ed degree across various specializations, it is considered as one of the top B.Ed. colleges in the state of Assam. Admission to its courses is completely based on the candidate’s score in the last qualifying examination. The college has all the modern facilities like classrooms, library, laboratories, computer center.

College_Summary: Sibsagar college was established in 1947 and is affiliated to Dibrugarh University. The college offers UG, PG and B.Ed programmes. Admission to all courses is on the basis of merit which is completely based on the marks secured by the candidates in their previous qualifying examination.

Courses_Details.Course Rating: 1 Reviews

College_Summary: Kaziranga University, Jorhat is one of the largest private universities in North-East India. The university is established under the Assam Private University Act, offering state-of-the-art education and research relevant to market needs. The university is promoted by the Trust under the banner of The North Eastern Knowledge Foundation (NEKF) and was founded by the Khetan Industrial Group.

Krishna Kanta Handiqui State Open University (KKHSOU) was established in 2005. It was established under the provision of the KKHSOU, Act’ 2005 which was enacted by the Govt. of Assam & published in the Assam Gazette. It is the fourteenth of its kind along with IGNOU and the only state Open University in the entire NE India. Its headquarters are located in Patgaon, Rani, Guwahati.

National Law University and Judicial Academy, Assam (NLUJAA) was established by the National Law University and Judicial Academy, Assam Act, 2009 (Act No. XXV of 2009) as the 14 National Law University established in the country and is located in Guwahati, the capital city of Assam. This Act was later amended the National Law University and Judicial Academy, Assam (Amendment) Act, 2011 (Act 2 of 2012), wherein the word ‘School’ was replaced by the word ‘University’. The objectives of the National Law University, Assam are to impart comprehensive legal education and training at all levels to achieve excellence in the legal education; to promote research in all branches of law; to disseminate legal knowledge by organizing lectures, seminars, symposia, workshops, and conferences on contemporary issues of law to promote legal awareness in the communities to achieve social and economic justice and to promote cultural, legal and ethical values with a view to promote and foster the rule of law and the objectives enshrined in the Constitution of India; and to liaise with institutions of higher learning and research in India and abroad.

College_Summary: Tezpur University is a central University, located in the North-Eastern state of Assam, India. Established in 1994, the university is recognized by the UGC and accredited with an A grade by the NAAC. Tezpur University is ranked 69th under the university category & 93rd in the management category by NIRF 2023 and has placed at 351-400 in QS Asian University Rankings 2023. The university comprises 27 departments and 4 schools such as the School of Sciences, School of Management Sciences, School of Humanities and Social Sciences, and School of Engineering.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Science [B.Sc] + Master of Science [M.Sc]

College_Summary: Dibrugarh Polytechnic is a prestigious polytechnic institute established in the year 1965. It is approved by AICTE and is affiliated to the State Council for Technical Education under DTE, Assam Govt. The institute offers Diploma courses across three engineering disciplines. Admission is on the basis of the Polytechnic Admission Test conducted by DTE, Assam. In recent years, the institute has witnessed the participation of well-known companies for campus placements.

Silchar Polytechnic Institute was established in 1960 and is approved by AICTE. The Institute offers full-time diploma courses in 4 disciplines. Admission in the Institute is done based on a written test as well as the interview process. The Institute has a placement cell that prepares students for the interviews and provides good placement opportunities to students of different fields.

College_Summary: Cotton University is a renowned public state university, re-established in the year 2017. Located in Guwahati, Assam, Cotton University was previously established, as Cotton College, in 1901 by Sir Henry Cotton. This University is UGC-approved and accredited with an ‘A’ grade by NAAC.

College_Name: Directorate of Distance Education, Dibrugarh University -  [DDEDU], Dibrugarh
College_Summary: Directorate of Distance Education is a distant and open learning institute set up by Dibrugarh University situated in Dibrugarh, Assam which was established in 2001. The center provides undergraduate, postgraduate, and PG diploma courses like BA, B.Com. B.Sc., MA, M.Sc., PGDM, etc.

College_Summary: Gauhati Commerce College is a private institution accredited by the NAAC, established in 1962 which is one of the most promising colleges of the state of Assam and also entire north-east India imparting business education at Higher Secondary, Degree and Postgraduate levels. It is affiliated to Guwahati University. This College provides BBA and B.Com courses at the UG level and the MBA, M.Com, and PGDCA courses at PG level in the field of Commerce, Accountancy, Business Management, and many more wherein candidates get the opportunity to build their career in several corporate firms.

College_Summary: Fakhruddin Ali Ahmed Medical College (FAAMC) is affiliated to Srimanta Sankaradeva University of Health Sciences (SSUHS) and approved by the MCC (Medical Council Committee).

Tezpur Medical College and Hospital is a government institute located in Bihaguri, Tezpur, Assam. It offers a number of undergraduate and postgraduate courses under 22 departments including Physiology, Microbiology, Pathology, Anatomy, Surgery, ENT, Orthopaedics, Radiology, Medicine, Psychiatry and more. The college provides quality education and excellent facilities to its students. Admission to this college is based on merit and entrance test.

College_Name: Lokanayak Omeo Kumar Das College - [LOKD], Sonitpur
College_Summary: Lokanayak Omeo Kumar Das College, Sonitpur, Assam is one of the oldest established colleges in the state. Today the institute has turned out to be the best pioneering hub for educational perfection. Associated to Gauhati University, the college not only excels in the scholastic areas, but also provides guidance, coaching, and counseling sessions in various extra-curricular activities ranging from NCC to Indoor Sports and Open & Distant Learning.

Nalbari College is a premier co-educational college of Arts and Science. In the beginning, the college was affiliated to Calcutta University, but in 1948, when Gauhati University was established it came under GU’s jurisdiction. At present, the college offers UG programs for 09 Humanities & Social Science departments and 07 Science departments and PG programs for Assamese and English. Further, since 2013, the College with approval from the University has introduced two more professional courses i.e. B.P.Ed and B.Sc. IT, as well as two new self-financing courses i.e. BCA and PGDCA. Admission to all the courses is done on the basis of merits in the qualifying examination.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Innovation and Corporate Entrepreneurship [PGDICE]

College_Summary: Pub Kamrup College is a public college established in the year 1972. It is situated in the trade center of Baihata Chariali in the Kamrup district of Assam. This college is affiliated to Gauhati University Assam. The college offers more than 10 courses approved by the University Grants Commission. Many add-on courses are also available to enrich one’s own skills to get placed in good companies.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Advanced Diploma in Medical Lab Technology

College_Summary: Tihu College was founded in 1963 in the Nalbari district of Assam, as a co-educational institution of higher studies. Duly recognized by the UGC, the college is affiliated to Gauhati University and graded B+ by NAAC.

The Gargaon College, one of the premier institutes of higher education in Assam, offers graduate and certificate courses in the domain of Arts, Science, and Commerce. These courses include B.A., B.Sc., B.Com., Certifications, and PG Diploma. The admission in the college is done on the basis of the merit. A merit list is published on the basis of 10+2 marks. The candidates can apply by filling the online application form.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Computer Applications [PGDCA]

College_Summary: Doomdooma College located at Dibrugarh, Assam is a reputed institute of higher education established in the year 1967. The College is affiliated to Dibrugarh University, Assam. It offers Undergraduate programs in the field of Arts, Science and Commerce and also skill-oriented courses across various specializations. The college has well-experienced teachers to impart quality education. It has an excellent infrastructure aiming to provide the students with a great learning environment

College_Summary: Established in 1959, under Guwahati University, Lumding College has achieved new heights and success till its establishment. It has gained new heights in terms of academics, sports, co-curricular activities.

Bilasipara College was established in the year 1960 and is affiliated to Gauhati University. The College is also recognized by the University Grants Commission under 2f and 12B. This College is accredited with a B grade in 2014 by the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC).

North Lakhimpur College, established in 1952 is an autonomous college located at Assam. It is affiliated to Dibrugarh University and accredited as ‘A’ grade by NAAC. The College is the first to receive autonomous status from UGC. The aim of this college is to raise the standards of higher education in North-Eastern India. It offers Undergraduate, Post-graduate & PG Diploma programs across various disciplines. Skill-based diploma and certificate courses are also available for enhancing skills.

K.C. Das Commerce College is a government college in the city of Guwahati, Assam. The college was assessed by the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC) and was accredited a B+ grade. It offers undergraduate and postgraduate programs. Currently, the college has 13 departments and imparts over 3,000 students with a well-organized teaching staff too. Admission to the courses is done on the basis of marks secured in the previous qualifying examination.

College_Summary: Gurucharan College (GC College) is a renowned institute of higher education established in the year 1935 at Silchar, Assam. The college is affiliated to the Assam University and re-accredited by NAAC with an A grade. It offers 2-year higher secondary courses and 3-year Degree courses in the field of Arts, Commerce and Science. Apart from these, there are also career-oriented diploma and certification courses. GC College is well-equipped with excellent academic and student-centric facilities. It has also a career counselling cell that works dedicatedly to provide the students with employment opportunities.

College_Summary: Kumar Bhaskar Varma Sanskrit and Ancient Studies University (KBVSASU) is a state university. It was established in the year 2011. It is located in HAtinamati, Assam. KBVSASU is a beautiful campus with all the facilities needed for the students. KBVSASU is affiliated with UGC. The university offers the undergraduate and post-graduate programme in Sanskrit and humanities.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Computer Applications [PGDCA]

College_Name: Inter National Institute of Fashion Design- (INIFD), Guwahati
College_Summary: Inter National Institute of Fashion Design (INIFD) is located in Guwahati, Assam.. It is a Private Institute. All the relevant programs are approved by the All-India Council for Technical Education. INIFD acts as a one platform with a number of opportunities like the 1 year Foundation Course, 2 year Advance Course, 3 years Specialization Course and 2 years Super Specialization Program. The institute represents London Fashion Week , New York Fashion Week and Lakme Fashion Week.

Established in the year 2009, Bodoland University is an esteemed university situated in Debargaon within the heart of Kokrajhar in Assam. Bodoland University was established by Bodoland University Act 2009, passed in the Assam legislative Assembly.

College_Name: Assam Rajiv Gandhi University of Cooperative Management - [ARGUCOM], Sivasagar
College_Summary: Assam Rajiv Gandhi University of Cooperative Management (ARGUCOM) is the first cooperative management university in the country. It was established in the year 2010 under the Assam Rajiv Gandhi University of Cooperative Management Act, 2010. The university is approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and recognized by University Grants Commission (UGC). ARGUCOM is one of the best universities offers study in Management, Technology, Law etc. There are five schools run under Assam Rajiv Gandhi University of Cooperative Management.ARGUCOM envisions to become an innovative, Growing and Multi-disciplinary Institution of learning university. They are committed to the principles of cooperation for socio-economic development with an international perspective.

IDOL GU is Gauhati University affiliated institute, founded in May 1998. IDOL Gauhati university offers postgraduate, undergraduate, and certificate in correspondence mode. GUIDOL has created its first E-learning portal in the northeast. There are 93 study centers and 40 examination centers.

College_Name: Don Bosco University Global Center for Open & Distance Education, Guwahati
Centre for Open and Distance Learning - [CODL], Napaam

College_Summary: Pune Institute of Business Management, Guwahati, a part of PIBM Pune, is a private college established in 2016, affiliated to Gauhati University and approved by AICTE, UGC and Govt. of Assam. The college offers BBA and B.Com courses in Accountancy, Finance and Management. Admission is done on the basis of the performance of the candidates in the previous qualifying examination.

Srimanta Sankaradeva University of Health Sciences (SSUHS) is located in Guwahati, Assam and is well connected by Air, Rail and Surface Transport.. It is the only Health University in the North Eastern Region of India and was established in 2009 under “The Srimanta Sankaradeva University of Health Science Act, 2007”. The University offers around 90 Courses through its Affiliate colleges, which stand at 47.

College_Summary: P.C.P.S Girls’ Polytechnic at Bamunimaidan, Guwahati is one of the oldest technical institutions in the Northeast region of India. The institute is spread across about 9 acres of land to offer diploma courses in four different disciplines for the eligible and interested women candidates.

Goalpara Polytechnic is located at Goalpara, which is 20 minutes away from Goalpara Railway Station and 10 minutes from Goalpara Bus Stand. The diploma courses offered by the polytechnic college impart basic education of engineering with scientific, computing, and mathematical techniques which enables students to solve many basic problems. The college has a vision towards providing World Class education facilities by presenting proper education methods and international training standards in diploma courses. Currently, the college is having more than 240 students and 50+ staff members to achieve excellence in education.

Barpeta Polytechnic has three diploma courses across two streams. The college is approved by AICTE, New Delhi, and functions under the Directorate of Technical Education (DTE), Government of Assam. It is situated at Ganakkuchi, which is 20 km away from the Barpeta Road Railway Station. The admission into the college requires the candidates to clear PAT and secure good ranking. The college campus is spread across 13 acres of land to provide hefty of facilities. The placements for the diploma holders will be easily available as it is a skill-oriented course.

Sonitpur Polytechnic College was established in 2017. It is a government polytechnic college located at Theram in the district of Sonitpur. The institute is approved by AICTE and is affiliated to the Directorate of Technical Education (DTE) Assam. Currently, Sonitpur Polytechnic College offers Diploma courses across specializations like Mechanical, Civil, and Electrical Engineering. Admission to the college is on the basis of the PAT entrance examination. The application process is available in online mode.

Dhemaji Polytechnic, established in 2017, is an AICTE approved college for Polytechnic and Government Institution affiliated to Directorate of Technical Education (DTE), Assam. The college is located in Dhemaji District, Assam which is one of the remotest corners of North-East India.

Golaghat polytechnic situated at Golaghat was recently established on 2017 by the state government of Assam. It is affiliated to the State council for technical education (SCTE). The college offers diploma in 3 specializations like civil, Mechanical, and Biomedical Engineering. It is located at a convenient location with excellent infrastructural facilities and has highly qualified faculties for quality education in order to secure a good placement. The admission process only takes place in the offline mode and the selection of the candidates aspiring admission will be done on based on the PAT performance.

The college offers undergraduate and diploma courses in the discipline of Humanities and Travel Studies. Admission to IAM is done on the basis of the performance of the candidates in the entrance exam.

Purbanchal Educational Welfare Society (PEWS) Group of Institutions, Guwahati was established in the year 2003. NEF College of Pharmacy is affiliated to Srimanta Sankaradeva University of Health Sciences, Guwahati and approved by Pharmacy Council of India (PCI), New Delhi. The College is also approved by the Health & Family Welfare Department, Government of Assam.

Pratiksha Institute of Pharmaceutical Science was established under Pratiksha Educational Trust. The Institute is approved by AICTE and PCI and is affiliated to ASTU, Guwahati. College_Summary: Established in 2011, the Assam Institute of Hotel Management in Guwahati is a leading private institute providing hospitality management education. The college provides courses ranging from certifications and diplomas to MBA and MTM degrees in Hotel Management. These courses are available in five specialisations, Housekeeping, Front Office, Food and Beverage Services, Kitchen Operations and Aviation. These are full-time courses completed over four to six semesters. Formed with a mission to groom talent, AIHM has generated several batches of Hospitality Management graduates who have been working for some of the top brands in the industry.

College_Name: Only Chef - The School of Culinary Arts, Guwahati

College_Summary: Apollo College of Nursing is a Guwahati based well-known private institution which was founded in 2009 under the broad umbrella of Apollo Hospitals Educational Trusts (AHET) Chennai. It offers an Undergraduate and a Diploma course in the discipline of Science and Nursing. The institute is a constituent part of Apollo Group, approved by Indian Nursing Council, Assam Nurses' Midwives' and Health Visitors' council. Apollo College of Nursing has received NOC from Govt. of Assam and affiliated to Srimanta Sankaradeva University of Health Sciences (SSUHS). Admission to college’s courses is granted to students based on their previous year qualifying exam score, overall performance and marks obtained in Common Entrance Examination (CEE) conducted by SSUHS.

College_Name: School of Business,Indian Institute of Technology Guwahati, Guwahati
Pratiksha School of Nursing, Guwahati, Assam
College_Summary: Pratiksha School of Nursing is a distinguished private college located in Guwahati. It was established under the aegis of Pratiksha Educational Trust and offers Undergraduate, and Diploma courses in the discipline of Nursing. The college is affiliated to the Indian Nursing Council & Assam Nursing Council, and recognized by the Government of Assam. Admission to PSN courses is granted to students depending on their marks in the preceding year’s qualifying exam.
